com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleDevice.BondListener.BondEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.BondListener.BondEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Enclosing interface:
    BleDevice.BondListener

    public static class BleDevice.BondListener.BondEvent
extends Event
implements UsesCustomNull
    Struct passed to BleDevice.BondListener.onEvent(BondEvent) to provide more information about a BleDevice.bond() attempt.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BleDevice device()
      The BleDevice that attempted to BleDevice.bond().
      int failReason()
      If status() is BleDevice.BondListener.Status.FAILED_EVENTUALLY, this integer will be one of the values enumerated in BluetoothDevice that start with UNBOND_REASON such as BleStatuses.UNBOND_REASON_AUTH_FAILED.
      State.ChangeIntent intent()
      Tells whether the bond was created through an explicit call through SweetBlue, or otherwise.
      boolean isNull()
      Returns true if the object's state represents what would otherwise be Java's built-in null.

      Convience to return the mac address of device().

      java.lang.String toString()

      Forwards BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.wasCancelled().

    • Method Detail

      • device

        public final BleDevice device()
        The BleDevice that attempted to BleDevice.bond().

      • macAddress

        public final java.lang.String macAddress()
        Convience to return the mac address of device().

      • status

        public final BleDevice.BondListener.Status status()
        The BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status associated with this event.

      • failReason

        public final int failReason()
        If status() is BleDevice.BondListener.Status.FAILED_EVENTUALLY, this integer will be one of the values enumerated in BluetoothDevice that start with UNBOND_REASON such as BleStatuses.UNBOND_REASON_AUTH_FAILED. Otherwise it will be equal to BleStatuses.BOND_FAIL_REASON_NOT_APPLICABLE. See also a publically accessible list in BleStatuses.

      • intent

        public final State.ChangeIntent intent()
        Tells whether the bond was created through an explicit call through SweetBlue, or otherwise. If State.ChangeIntent.INTENTIONAL, then BleDevice.bond() (or overloads) were called. If State.ChangeIntent.UNINTENTIONAL, then the bond was created "spontaneously" as far as SweetBlue is concerned, whether through another app, the OS Bluetooth settings, or maybe from a request by the remote BLE device itself.

      • wasSuccess

        public final boolean wasSuccess()
        Shortcut for checking if status() == BleDevice.BondListener.Status.SUCCESS.

      • wasCancelled

        public final boolean wasCancelled()
        Forwards BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.wasCancelled().

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

        public final boolean isNull()
        Description copied from interface: UsesCustomNull
